= Git User's Survey 2010 =

<b><font size="large">The "Git User's Survey 2010" has begun.</font></b>

[https://www.survs.com/survey/MUPYR8UJ4B Git User's Survey 2010] is up now!. Please devote a few minutes of your time to fill this simple questionnaire, it will help a lot the Git community to understand your needs, what you like of Git, and of course what you don't like of it.

You will be able to take part in the survey from '''1 September''' to '''15 October, 2010'''.

Have fun!

* http://tinyurl.com/GitSurvey2010 (expands to the link below)
* https://www.survs.com/survey/MUPYR8UJ4B

There is also alternate version which does not require cookies,
but it doesn't allow one to go back to response and edit it.  

* https://www.survs.com/survey/AIOREJNBPX
